* Harrish Ingraham (1881–?), Hollywood film director, writer and actor in the era of silent movies

response: | Child of M'sieu || February 16, 1919|| Harrish Ingraham ||

The Blood of His Fathers is a 1917 American silent drama film directed by Harrish Ingraham and starring Crane Wilbur, Jode Mullally and Ruth King.Connelly p.324 The film begins shortly after the American Civil War when a renegade Confederate soldier commits three murders before jumping on to 1917.
